Amelie.line: Yes, indeed I solved the questionnaire.

Elliot.line: Pardon my question, but... how? Wasn't it super difficult?

Amelie.line: Yes, I admit it was not easy. However, you see, despite my current appearance, I have lectured on thermo- and fluid dynamics for over 30 years at various universities.
In fact, that questionnaire quite resembled the tests I gave to my students, back in my day. I would go so far to even suspect that it was an actual student of mine who created it...
